original_text: And while they still did not believe it because of joy and amazement, he asked them, “Do you have anything here to eat?”
korean_text: 그들이 너무 기쁘므로 아직도 믿지 못하고 놀랍게 여길 때에 이르시되 여기 무슨 먹을 것이 있느냐 하시니

sentences.original_text: And while they still did not believe it
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 아직도 그것을 믿지 않았을 때

sentences.original_text: Do you have anything here to eat?
